title: Agnes, Maude & Pearly too
creator_credit: AFTRS, Charles Mitchell, Alice Jacques and Erica Glynn
brief_description: Two sisters meet up to play pokies on their deceased sister’s favourite pokie machine before scattering her ashes. Shortly afterward, their grief compounds and the truth of the past is revealed and confronted.
creator_credit_for_label: AFTRS, Charles Mitchell, Alice Jacques and Erica Glynn
